text: [Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Eric a senior technical
customer service specialist based in our
Dublin office today I'll show you how to
transfer ownership of your AWS account
let's get
started the transfer ownership of your
AWS account and its Associated resources
to another entity you must know the AWS
account root user email and password
however before before we do this let's
review some best practices before
assigning ownership deactivate any
multiactor authentication devices or at
another MFA device and the activate
unnecessary ones inform the new account
owner that they must configure their own
security Challenge questions make sure
that you have a default payment method
associated with the account and then
work with the new owner to update or
remove it if you have AWS
organizations's members accounts you
must move them to the new organization
next you can assign ownership to a
different entity navigate to the AWS
sales support
form fill out the form selecting other
for use case and sales support for
nature of inquiry in the tell us about
your project field explain that you want
to transfer ownership of your AWS
account next click submit the form an
AWS sales team member will contact you
to complete complete the assignment
process to complete the account transfer
you must update the AWS root account
user to complete the account transfer
you must update the AWS account root
user sign in to the AWS Management
console as the root
user go to account settings and edit the
account credentials to use the new root
user signin details save the change
and then sign
out use the new root user credentials to
sign
in and now you know how to transfer
ownership of your AWS account thanks for
watching and happy cloud computing from
all of us here at AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
